title: Franky Shogun vs Buffalo and Baby 5
description: Franky in his General Franky Shogun form engages in combat with Donquixote Doflamingo's subordinates Buffalo and Baby 5. Baby 5 transforms using her Buki Buki no Mi powers to attack the massive robot.
significance: Demonstrates Franky's post-timeskip power upgrade and introduces the formidable General Franky Shogun in battle.

quotes.text: You two deserve credit only for breaking through the robot's armor. You're like a praying mantis taking on a warship!
quotes.speaker: Franky
quotes.context: Franky taunting Buffalo and Baby 5 after they damage his Shogun's armor

title: Caesar Captured - Plan Step One Complete
description: As Buffalo, Baby 5, and Caesar fall into the ocean, Law declares that the first step of his plan is complete. Caesar has been successfully captured with seastone handcuffs, neutralizing his powers.
significance: Major milestone in Law's plan to take down Doflamingo. The capture of Caesar Clown sets the stage for the Dressrosa Arc and the eventual confrontation with Doflamingo.

quotes.text: The first step of the plan is complete.
quotes.speaker: Law
quotes.context: Law confirming the successful capture of Caesar
